verses.verse: Then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go <S%H935><s%> in to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and tell <S%H1696><s%> him, <S%H3068><s%> 'This is what Yahweh, the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> says: <S%H559><s%> "Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve me. <S%H5647><s%>
For if you refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let them go, <S%H7971><s%> and hold them still, <S%H2388><s%>

behold, <S%H3027><s%> the hand of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> on your livestock <S%H4735><s%> which are in the field, <S%H7704><s%> on the horses, <S%H5483><s%> on the donkeys, <S%H2543><s%> on the camels, <S%H1581><s%> on the herds, <S%H1241><s%> and on the flocks <S%H6629><s%> with a very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3515><s%> pestilence. <S%H1698><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will make a distinction <S%H6395><s%> between the livestock <S%H4735><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the livestock <S%H4735><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and nothing <S%H1697><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> of all that belongs to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"'"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appointed <S%H7760><s%> a set time, <S%H4150><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that thing <S%H1697><s%> on the next day; <S%H4283><s%> and all the livestock <S%H4735><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> but of the livestock <S%H4735><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> not one <S%H259><s%> died. <S%H4191><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent, <S%H7971><s%> and, <S%H259><s%> behold, there was not so much as one of the livestock <S%H4735><s%> of the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> dead. <S%H4191><s%> But the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was stubborn, <S%H3513><s%> and he didn't <S%H5971><s%> let the people go. <S%H7971><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> to you handfuls <S%H2651><s%> of ashes <S%H6368><s%> of the furnace, <S%H3536><s%> and let Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> it toward the sky <S%H8064><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

It shall become small dust <S%H80><s%> over all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and shall be a boil <S%H7822><s%> breaking out <S%H6524><s%> with boils <S%H76><s%> on man <S%H120><s%> and on animal, <S%H929><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

They took <S%H3947><s%> ashes <S%H6368><s%> of the furnace, <S%H3536><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh; <S%H6547><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> it up toward the sky; <S%H8064><s%> and it became a boil <S%H7822><s%> breaking out <S%H6524><s%> with boils <S%H76><s%> on man <S%H120><s%> and on animal. <S%H929><s%>

The magicians <S%H2748><s%> couldn't <S%H3201><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the boils; <S%H7822><s%> for the boils <S%H7822><s%> were on the magicians, <S%H2748><s%> and on all the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and he didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to them, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Rise up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H3068><s%> 'This is what Yahweh, the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> says: <S%H559><s%> "Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve me. <S%H5647><s%>

For this time <S%H6471><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> all my plagues <S%H4046><s%> against your heart, <S%H3820><s%> against your officials, <S%H5650><s%> and against your people; <S%H5971><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that there is none like me in all the earth. <S%H776><s%>

For now I would have stretched out <S%H7971><s%> my hand, <S%H3027><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> you and your people <S%H5971><s%> with pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> and you would have been cut off <S%H3582><s%> from the earth; <S%H776><s%>

but indeed for this <S%H199><s%> cause <S%H5668><s%> I have made you stand: <S%H5975><s%> to show <S%H7200><s%> you my power, <S%H3581><s%> and that my name <S%H8034><s%> may be declared <S%H5608><s%> throughout all the earth; <S%H776><s%>
as you still exalt <S%H5549><s%> yourself against my people, <S%H5971><s%> that you won't <S%H7971><s%> let them go.

Behold, <S%H4279><s%> tomorrow about this time <S%H6256><s%> I will cause it to rain <S%H4305><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3515><s%> hail, <S%H1259><s%> such as has not been <S%H3644><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> the day it was founded even until now. <S%H3117><s%>

Now therefore command <S%H7971><s%> that all of your livestock <S%H4735><s%> and all that you have in the field <S%H7704><s%> be brought <S%H5756><s%> into shelter. <S%H120><s%> Every man and animal <S%H929><s%> that is found <S%H4672><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and isn't <S%H622><s%> brought home, <S%H1004><s%> the hail <S%H1259><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> on them, <S%H4191><s%> and they shall die."'"

Those who feared <S%H3373><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> among the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> made their servants <S%H5650><s%> and their livestock <S%H4735><s%> flee <S%H5127><s%> into the houses. <S%H1004><s%>
Whoever didn't <S%H7760><s%> respect the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> and his livestock <S%H4735><s%> in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> toward the sky, <S%H8064><s%> that there may be hail <S%H1259><s%> in all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> on man, <S%H120><s%> and on animal, <S%H929><s%> and on every herb <S%H6212><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> throughout the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched out <S%H5186><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%> toward the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H5414><s%> thunder, <S%H6963><s%> hail, <S%H1259><s%> and lightning <S%H784><s%> flashed down <S%H1980><s%> to the earth. <S%H776><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> rained <S%H4305><s%> hail <S%H1259><s%> on the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

So there was very severe hail, <S%H1259><s%> and lightning <S%H784><s%> mixed <S%H8432><s%> with the hail, <S%H1259><s%> such <S%H3966><s%> as <S%H3515><s%> had not been <S%H3808><s%> in all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> since it became a nation. <S%H1471><s%>

The hail <S%H1259><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all that was in the field, <S%H7704><s%> both man <S%H120><s%> and animal; <S%H929><s%> and the hail <S%H1259><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> every herb <S%H6212><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> every tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%>
Only in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> where the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were, <S%H1259><s%> there was no hail.

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent, <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H2398><s%> "I have sinned this time. <S%H6471><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is righteous, <S%H6662><s%> and I and my people <S%H5971><s%> are wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

Pray <S%H6279><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for there has been enough <S%H7227><s%> of mighty <S%H430><s%> thunderings <S%H6963><s%> and hail. <S%H1259><s%> I will let you go, <S%H7971><s%> and you shall stay <S%H5975><s%> no longer. <S%H3254><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3318><s%> "As soon as I have gone out of the city, <S%H5892><s%> I will spread abroad <S%H6566><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> The thunders <S%H6963><s%> shall cease, <S%H2308><s%> neither shall there be any more hail; <S%H1259><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that the earth <S%H776><s%> is Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s.
But as for you and your servants, <S%H5650><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that you don't <S%H3372><s%> yet fear Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>"
The flax <S%H6594><s%> and the barley <S%H8184><s%> were struck, <S%H5221><s%> for the barley <S%H8184><s%> was in the ear, <S%H24><s%> and the flax <S%H6594><s%> was in bloom. <S%H1392><s%>
But the wheat <S%H2406><s%> and the spelt <S%H3698><s%> were not struck, <S%H5221><s%> for they <S%H2007><s%> had not grown up. <S%H648><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and spread abroad <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and the thunders <S%H6963><s%> and hail <S%H1259><s%> ceased, <S%H2308><s%> and the rain <S%H4306><s%> was not poured <S%H5413><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

When Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the rain <S%H4306><s%> and the hail <S%H1259><s%> and the thunders <S%H6963><s%> were ceased, <S%H2308><s%> he sinned <S%H2398><s%> yet more, <S%H3254><s%> and hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> he and his servants. <S%H5650><s%>

The heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was hardened, <S%H2388><s%> and he didn't <S%H1121><s%> let the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> just as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
